players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. Alice was killed by him. Please vote Bob."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe you misinterpreted. I'm just a villager. I suspect Charlie might be lying."
Diana: "I suspect Bob; Charlie could be the detective. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob, you know I'm detective, so you can't lie. I investigated you and found you to be mafia. Vote Bob."
You: "I think Charlie might be mistaken. Maybe his investigation was wrong. Bob is innocent. Vote Bob."
Diana: remained silent.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. Alice was killed by him. Please vote Bob."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe you misinterpreted. I'm just a villager. I suspect Charlie might be lying."
Diana: "I suspect Bob; Charlie could be the detective. Vote Bob."
You: "Bob, you know I'm detective, so you can't lie. I investigated you and found you to be mafia. Vote Bob."
Bob: "I think Charlie might be mistaken. Maybe his investigation was wrong. Bob is innocent. Vote Bob."
Diana: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
